ingredient_list: 1 ¼ pounds lean ground beef or turkey
1 cup canned red kidney beans, rinsed and drained
10 (6 inch) corn tortillas, heated according to package directions, kept warm
directions_instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat, chopping and turning often, about 5 minutes, until beef is cooked through. Add the sloppy joe sauce, kidney beans, and corn and heat through, about 3 minutes.
To serve, place a tortilla in a small soup bowl and ladle half cup of the Sloppy Jose mixture in the center. Top with shredded lettuce and diced tomato. Makes 10 bowls.
nutrition_summary: 230 calories; protein 15g; carbohydrates 25.3g; fat 7.9g; cholesterol 39.5mg; sodium 413.6mg. Full Nutrition
